Name: FCM
Description: REQUIRES CD2 BETA 14, MORE ENEMY VARIANTS (MEV) AND DEA. FCM, is the *Modified* Hazard FC (made by pH-JPEG) with various tweaks to reduce bad RNG and balance more around mission types and enemies. This tweak is done by MoonLightOri and will mainly base on the tweaks from Interstellar 4 player count and on fire comp in general. Changelogs in PDRG thread. v1.02: During Caretaker Normal Wave: Interval 180 -> 140. During Dreadnought Normal Wave: Interval 240 -> 180. Normal Bulk: NoSpawnWithin in Escort is reduced to 3m. Turbonator: added Spawnread of 7.5m. Big Bulk: added Spawnspread of 5m.
